virality_potential.justification: Cryptocurrency names with a link lack engagement hooks. Limited appeal beyond crypto enthusiasts.

informative_value.justification: No contextual information provided beyond mentioning two cryptocurrencies.

duration_of_impact.justification: Mere name references without substance become irrelevant immediately.

virality_potential.justification: High-value NFT transaction details attract crypto community attention.

informative_value.justification: Specific transaction data with dollar amounts and participant addresses.

duration_of_impact.justification: Notable NFT sales remain reference points for weeks in crypto circles.

virality_potential.justification: Influential account's call-to-action generates excitement in crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Generic investment advice without supporting data or context.

duration_of_impact.justification: Generic advice loses relevance quickly as market conditions change.

virality_potential.justification: Major financial milestone presented with attention-grabbing emoji.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Positive surprise indicated by the shocked emoji.

duration_of_impact.justification: Market cap comparisons remain relevant for weeks in financial discussions.

virality_potential.justification: Celebrity opinion on crypto rivalry sparks debates.

duration_of_impact.justification: Celebrity opinions drive short-term engagement spikes.

virality_potential.justification: Relatable technical frustrations resonate with crypto users.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Frustration evident through emoji and failed transaction narrative.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant until network congestion issues are resolved.

virality_potential.justification: Major financial milestone from a credible source.

duration_of_impact.justification: Market cap milestones remain reference points in financial analysis.

virality_potential.justification: Major corporate adoption news from influential figure.

duration_of_impact.justification: Corporate treasury allocations set long-term industry precedents.

virality_potential.justification: Primary source announcement of major corporate crypto adoption.

informative_value.justification: Detailed official statement with investment specifics and ESG considerations.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Professional announcement tone without emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Landmark corporate action likely referenced for years in crypto adoption timelines.

virality_potential.justification: Concise announcement of corporate crypto adoption attracts attention.

informative_value.justification: Clear statement of treasury allocation without full details.

duration_of_impact.justification: Corporate crypto adoption news maintains relevance in financial discourse.
